tool_description: An API that shows all the latest news related to cryptocurrency
name: Cryptocurrency New Live
title: Cryptocurrency New Live

api_list.name: Get individual news
api_list.description: Get individual news from various famous websites.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-new-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/moneycontrol"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-new-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-new-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-new-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
